Verses: 2 nee Aaronodum Avan Kumaararodum Isravel Puththirar Anaivarodum Sollavendiyadhaavadhu; Karththar Kattalaiyidugiradhu Ennavendraal:

3 isravel Kudumbaththaaril Evanaagilum Maattaiyaavadhu Semmariyaattaiyaavadhu Vellaattaiyaavadhu Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalaagiya Karththarudaiya Vaasasthalaththukku Munbaaga, Karththarukku Seluththumpadi Konduvaraamal,

4 paalayaththukkulleyaagilum Paalayaththukkup Purambeyaagilum Adhaik Kondraal, Adhu Andha Manidhanukku Raththappazhiyaaga Ennappadum. Andha Manidhan Raththam Sindhinapadiyaal, Than Janaththil Iraamal Aruppundu Povaan.

5 aagaiyaal Isravel Puththirar Veliyile Paliyidugira Thangal Paligalai, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Aasaariyanidaththil Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu, Ange Avaigalaik Karththarukku Samaadhaana Paligalaaga Seluththakkadavargal.
6 ange Aasaariyan Raththaththai Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalilirukkira Karththarudaiya Palipeedaththinmel Theliththu, Kozhuppaik Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaagath ThaganikkakkadavanÂ .
7 thaangal Soramaarkkamaaip Pinpatrugira Peygalukkuth Thangal Paligalai Ini Seluththaadhiruppaargalaaga; Idhu Avargal Thalaimuraithorum Avargalukku Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkakkadavadhu.
8 melum Nee Avargalai Nokki: Isravel Kudumbaththaarilum Ungal Naduve Thangugira Anniyargalilum Evanaagilum Sarvaanga Thaganapali Mudhalaanavaigalaiyittu,
9 adhai Aasarippuk Koodaara Vaasalile Karththarukku Seluththumpadi Konduvaraavittaal, Avan Than Janaththil Iraamal Aruppundupovaan Endru Sol.

10 isravel Kudumbaththaarilum Ungalukkul Thangum Anniyargalilum Evanaagilum Raththam Ennappattadhaip Pusiththaal, Raththaththaip Pusiththa Avanukku Virodhamaaga Naan En Mugaththaith Thiruppi, Avan Than Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Avanai Aruppundupogap Pannuven.

11 maamsaththin Uyir Raththaththil Irukkiradhu; Naan Adhai Ungalukkup Palipeedaththinmel Ungal Aaththumaakkalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadikkuk Kattalaiyitten; Aaththumaavirkaagap Paavanivirththi Seygiradhu Raththame.
12 adhinimiththam Ungalil Oruvanum Raththam Pusikkavendaam, Ungal Naduve Thangugira Anniyanum Raththam Pusikkavendaam Endru Isravel Puththirarukku Sonnen.

13 isravel Puththirarilum Ungalukkul Thangugira Anniyargalilum Evanaagilum Pusikkaththakka Oru Mirugaththaiyaavadhu Oru Patchiyaiyaavadhu Vettaiyaadip Pidiththaal, Avan Adhin Raththaththai Sindhappanni, Manninaal Adhai Moodakkadavan.

14 sagala Maamsaththukkum Raththam Uyiraayirukkiradhu; Raththam Jeevanukku Samaanam; Aagaiyaal Endha Maamsaththin Raththaththaiyum Pusikkavendaam. Sagala Maamsaththin Uyirum Adhin Raththandhaane; Adhaip Pusikkira Evanum Aruppundupovaan Endru Isravel Puththirarukku Sonnen.

15 thaanaai Irandhuponadhaiyaavadhu, Peerundadhaiyaavadhu, Pusiththavan Evanum, Avan Sudhesiyaanaalum Paradhesiyaanaalum, Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Thanneeril Muzhugi, Saayankaalammattum Theettaayiruppaanaaga; Pinbu Suththamaayiruppaan.
16 avan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoikkaamalum, Snaanampannaamalum Irundhaal, Than Akkiramaththai Sumappaan Endru Sol Endraar.
